name: Ecchi Beauties
description:
In Ecchi Beauties you can find your next waifu. Discover 8 beautiful puzzles in up to 4 different variants. Adult only version available as FREE DLC!

Also enjoy the easy to control gallery where you can enjoy all the girls in all variations which you already unlocked. Take all the time you need and enjoy the beautiful Waifus.

For those who just want to enjoy the girls there is an unlock mode in the puzzle itself.

Adult only version available as FREE DLC!
